packages.name: GitHub Desktop
packages.description: Fork of GitHub Desktop to support various Linux distributions

packages.name: AppImageKit
packages.description: Package desktop applications as AppImages that run on common Linux-based operating systems, such as RHEL, CentOS, openSUSE, SLED, Ubuntu, Fedora, debian and derivatives. Join #AppImage on irc.freenode.net

packages.name: luna
packages.description: Manage npm dependencies through a modern UI.

packages.name: wifi-channel-watcher
packages.description: Monitor channel usage of neighboring routers & get an alert if your active channel is not optimal.  Troubleshoot wifi without lifting a finger!
